ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:19:45 [Issue ID 4000-99172] urn:comicvine:4000-99172 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 09:22:47. [Issue ID 99172]
ComicInfo.Summary: After attacking the Electro-storms and stopping them from consuming Earth, Angela is thrown into Limbo's core. She rescues a Heaven agent, Callindra and her clients, the Custers. Angela fights the demonoids & meets the anti-angel Lilith and Deurges. Angela clashes with Lilith, losing her Elysium-lock to Deurges. Angela and Lilith end up at the lifeless planet, Pentages-Fraser. In a rage, she tosses Lilith into the Argus, and swears vengeance on Deurges.
ComicInfo.Title: Cataclysm
